summary: Reduced weight on pickaxe and woodcutter axe to 3
descriptionHtml:
Reduced weight on pickaxe and woodcutter axe to 3. I know, I know it's been done hundreds of times before, but mine's different. Mine includes the poacher's axe, the notched pickaxe, and the ancient nordic pickaxe.Â  I haven't been able to find one that includes all of those before. All USLEEP and/or WAFR fixes have been brought forward. Should be compatible with texture/mesh replacers that don't rely upon an esp.

Fully compatible (and recommended) with Frostfall

Requires Dragonborn
author: Stalfos81
